subject: Re: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN2316
description_text:
Hi, aside from the price difference, if I did upgrade and paid the extra
cost when would I receive it compared to if I waited. I don’t think it’s
fair I have to experience such a large delay and then have to pay extra
just for something to come sooner.

On Wed, Aug 13, 2025 at 11:27 PM SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> SIMSONN <https://www.simsonn.com>
>
> Hello, the Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 / Baseplate you purchased is currently out of
> stock in our US warehouse. We can upgrade you to the Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 /
> Baseplate at a discounted price of $34.90 (the original price difference is
> $53.31). Alternatively, we can ship it to you from China, or you can wait
> until the 20th when we will restock and ship it to you from our US
> warehouse. Please let me know your choice as soon as possible. We apologize
> for any inconvenience this may cause!
>
> If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at
> service@simsonn.com
>

conversations.body_text: Hi SiMing Lin,    The 3-pedal version is in stock at our US warehouse and is expected to be delivered to you in about 3-5 days. In addition, we do not charge extra fees, but offer you an upgrade from the 2-pedal to the 3-pedal version at a discounted price. This is not a mandatory option, and we hope you understand.

Okay then let’s move forward with this.

On Thu, Aug 14, 2025 at 10:16 PM service@simsonn.com

I would be okay with having the 3-pedal version and it sounds good that it
can be delivered in about a week. Can I also inquire about the pedals
themselves? How many days before they would arrive?
Hi SiMing Lin,      Okay, you can click on this link to make the payment, and we will arrange for your shipment first.
